channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo Group Ltd. -- Service Bridge
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo Group Ltd. -- Service Bridge

item.title: CVE-2016-8231|2024-08-06T02:13:21.834Z -- lenovo%20group%20ltd. -- service%20bridge
item.description: In Lenovo Service Bridge before version 4, a bug found in the signature verification logic of the code signing certificate could be exploited by an attacker to insert a forged code signing certificate.

item.title: CVE-2016-8229|2024-08-06T02:13:21.912Z -- lenovo%20group%20ltd. -- service%20bridge
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Lenovo Service Bridge before version 4 could be exploited by an attacker with access to the DHCP server used by the system where LSB is installed.

item.title: CVE-2016-8230|2024-08-06T02:13:21.920Z -- lenovo%20group%20ltd. -- service%20bridge
item.description: In Lenovo Service Bridge before version 4, an insecure HTTP connection is used by LSB to send system serial number, machine type and model and product name to Lenovo's servers.

item.title: CVE-2016-8228|2024-08-06T02:13:21.974Z -- lenovo%20group%20ltd. -- service%20bridge
item.description: In Lenovo Service Bridge before version 4, a user with local privileges on a system could execute code with administrative privileges.
